# Purrify

> Purrify makes activated carbon cat litter odor-control granules that reduce ammonia and litter box odors at the source.

This file provides a curated set of pages for LLM inference-time understanding of Purrify products, science, and customer support information.

## Core

- [Homepage](https://www.purrify.ca/): Primary overview of the brand and product positioning.
- [Products](https://www.purrify.ca/products/): Product lineup, sizes, and purchase options.
- [Trial Size](https://www.purrify.ca/products/trial-size/): Entry product and trial offer details.

## Learn

- [Learn Hub](https://www.purrify.ca/learn/): Educational landing page for odor-control content.
- [How It Works](https://www.purrify.ca/learn/how-it-works/): Practical explanation of how Purrify granules are used.
- [Science](https://www.purrify.ca/science/): Scientific context behind odor and ammonia control.
- [Ammonia Science](https://www.purrify.ca/learn/ammonia-science/): Focused ammonia-related guidance.
- [FAQ](https://www.purrify.ca/learn/faq/): Frequently asked questions.
- [Blog](https://www.purrify.ca/blog/): Ongoing cat care and odor-control articles.

## Support

- [Support Center](https://www.purrify.ca/support/): Customer help and support paths.
- [Contact](https://www.purrify.ca/contact/): Contact form and support access.
- [Shipping](https://www.purrify.ca/support/shipping/): Shipping details and expectations.
- [Subscription Support](https://www.purrify.ca/support/subscription/): Subscription-related help.
- [Privacy Policy](https://www.purrify.ca/privacy-policy/): Privacy terms and data handling details.
- [Terms](https://www.purrify.ca/terms/): Terms of service.

## Optional

- [About](https://www.purrify.ca/about/our-story/): Company story and background.
- [Retail Locations](https://www.purrify.ca/locations/): Location and availability information.
- [Store Locator](https://www.purrify.ca/stores/): Store lookup experience.
- [Case Studies](https://www.purrify.ca/case-studies/): Real-world outcomes and customer stories.
- [Reviews](https://www.purrify.ca/reviews/): Customer review summaries.
- [B2B](https://www.purrify.ca/b2b/): Wholesale and business partnership information.
- [Cat Litter Calculator](https://www.purrify.ca/tools/cat-litter-calculator/): Utility tool for litter planning.
